AddTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for a specified AWS resource

AssociateOpsItemRelatedItem.description: Grants permission to associate RelatedItem to an OpsItem

CancelCommand.description: Grants permission to cancel a specified Run Command command

CancelMaintenanceWindowExecution.description: Grants permission to cancel an in-progress maintenance window execution

CreateActivation.description: Grants permission to create an activation that is used to register on-premises servers and virtual machines (VMs) with Systems Manager

CreateAssociation.description: Grants permission to associate a specified Systems Manager document with specified instances or other targets

CreateAssociationBatch.description: Grants permission to combine entries for multiple CreateAssociation operations in a single command

CreateDocument.description: Grants permission to create a Systems Manager SSM document

CreateMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to create a maintenance window

CreateOpsItem.description: Grants permission to create an OpsItem in OpsCenter

CreateOpsMetadata.description: Grants permission to create an OpsMetadata object for an AWS resource

CreatePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to create a patch baseline

CreateResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to create a resource data sync configuration, which regularly collects inventory data from managed instances and updates the data in an Amazon S3 bucket

DeleteActivation.description: Grants permission to delete a specified activation for managed instances

DeleteAssociation.description: Grants permission to disassociate a specified SSM document from a specified instance

DeleteDocument.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM document and its instance associations

DeleteInventory.description: Grants permission to delete a specified custom inventory type, or the data associated with a custom inventory type

DeleteMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to delete a specified maintenance window

DeleteOpsMetadata.description: Grants permission to delete an OpsMetadata object

DeleteParameter.description: Grants permission to delete a specified SSM parameter

DeleteParameters.description: Grants permission to delete multiple specified SSM parameters

DeletePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to delete a specified patch baseline

DeleteResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to delete a specified resource data sync

DeregisterManagedInstance.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified on-premises server or virtual machine (VM) from Systems Manager

DeregisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified patch baseline from being the default patch baseline for a specified patch group

DeregisterTargetFromMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified target from a maintenance window

DeregisterTaskFromMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to deregister a specified task from a maintenance window

DescribeActivations.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified managed instance activation, such as when it was created and the number of instances registered using the activation

DescribeAssociation.description: Grants permission to view details about the specified association for a specified instance or target

DescribeAssociationExecutionTargets.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified association execution

DescribeAssociationExecutions.description: Grants permission to view all executions for a specified association

DescribeAutomationExecutions.description: Grants permission to view details about all active and terminated Automation executions

DescribeAutomationStepExecutions.description: Grants permission to view information about all active and terminated step executions in an Automation workflow

DescribeAvailablePatches.description: Grants permission to view all patches eligible to include in a patch baseline

DescribeDocument.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM document

DescribeDocumentParameters.description: Grants permission to display information about SSM document parameters in the Systems Manager console (internal Systems Manager action)

DescribeDocumentPermission.description: Grants permission to view the permissions for a specified SSM document

DescribeEffectiveInstanceAssociations.description: Grants permission to view all current associations for a specified instance

DescribeEffectivePatchesForPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to view details about the patches currently associated with the specified patch baseline (Windows only)

DescribeInstanceAssociationsStatus.description: Grants permission to view the status of the associations for a specified instance

DescribeInstanceInformation.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified instance

DescribeInstancePatchStates.description: Grants permission to view status details about patches on a specified instance

DescribeInstancePatchStatesForPatchGroup.description: Grants permission to describe the high-level patch state for the instances in the specified patch group

DescribeInstancePatches.description: Grants permission to view general details about the patches on a specified instance

DescribeInstanceProperties.description: Grants permission to user's Amazon EC2 console to render managed instances' nodes

DescribeInventoryDeletions.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified inventory deletion

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskIn.description: Grants permission to view details of a specified task execution for a maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks.description: Grants permission to view details about the tasks that ran during a specified maintenance window execution

DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions.description: Grants permission to view the executions of a specified maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowSchedule.description: Grants permission to view details about upcoming executions of a specified maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets.description: Grants permission to view a list of the targets associated with a specified maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks.description: Grants permission to view a list of the tasks associated with a specified maintenance window

DescribeMaintenanceWindows.description: Grants permission to view information about all or specified maintenance windows

DescribeMaintenanceWindowsForTarget.description: Grants permission to view information about the maintenance window targets and tasks associated with a specified instance

DescribeOpsItems.description: Grants permission to view details about specified OpsItems

DescribeParameters.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified SSM parameter

DescribePatchBaselines.description: Grants permission to view information about patch baselines that meet the specified criteria

DescribePatchGroupState.description: Grants permission to view aggregated status details for patches for a specified patch group

DescribePatchGroups.description: Grants permission to view information about the patch baseline for a specified patch group

DescribePatchProperties.description: Grants permission to view details of available patches for a specified operating system and patch property

DescribeSessions.description: Grants permission to view a list of recent Session Manager sessions that meet the specified search criteria

DisassociateOpsItemRelatedItem.description: Grants permission to disassociate RelatedItem from an OpsItem

GetAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to view details of a specified Automation execution

GetCalendar.description: Grants permission to view details of a specific calendar

GetCalendarState.description: Grants permission to view the calendar state for a change calendar or a list of change calendars

GetCommandInvocation.description: Grants permission to view details about the command execution of a specified invocation or plugin

GetConnectionStatus.description: Grants permission to view the Session Manager connection status for a specified managed instance

GetDefaultPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to view the current default patch baseline for a specified operating system type

GetDeployablePatchSnapshotForInstance.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current patch baseline snapshot for a specified instance

GetDocument.description: Grants permission to view the contents of a specified SSM document

GetInventory.description: Grants permission to view instance inventory details per the specified criteria

GetInventorySchema.description: Grants permission to view a list of inventory types or attribute names for a specified inventory item type

GetMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window

GetMaintenanceWindowExecution.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution

GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTask.description: Grants permission to view details about a specified maintenance window execution task

GetMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocat.description: Grants permission to view details about a specific maintenance window task running on a specific target

GetMaintenanceWindowTask.description: Grants permission to view details about tasks registered with a specified maintenance window

GetManifest.description: Grants permission to Systems Manager and SSM Agent to determine package installation requirements for an instance (internal Systems Manager call)

GetOpsItem.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified OpsItem

GetOpsMetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve an OpsMetadata object

GetOpsSummary.description: Grants permission to view summary information about OpsItems based on specified filters and aggregators

GetParameter.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified parameter

GetParameterHistory.description: Grants permission to view details and changes for a specified parameter

GetParameters.description: Grants permission to view information about multiple specified parameters

GetParametersByPath.description: Grants permission to view information about parameters in a specified hierarchy

GetPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified patch baseline

GetPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description: Grants permission to view the ID of the current patch baseline for a specified patch group

GetServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to view the account-level setting for an AWS service

LabelParameterVersion.description: Grants permission to apply an identifying label to a specified version of a parameter

ListAssociationVersions.description: Grants permission to list versions of the specified association

ListAssociations.description: Grants permission to list the associations for a specified SSM document or managed instance

ListCommandInvocations.description: Grants permission to list information about command invocations sent to a specified instance

ListCommands.description: Grants permission to list the commands sent to a specified instance

ListComplianceItems.description: Grants permission to list compliance status for specified resource types on a specified resource

ListComplianceSummaries.description: Grants permission to list a summary count of compliant and noncompliant resources for a specified compliance type

ListDocumentMetadataHistory.description: Grants permission to view metadata history about a specified SSM document

ListDocumentVersions.description: Grants permission to list all versions of a specified document

ListDocuments.description: Grants permission to view information about a specified SSM document

ListInstanceAssociations.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to check for new State Manager associations (internal Systems Manager call)

ListInventoryEntries.description: Grants permission to view a list of specified inventory types for a specified instance

ListOpsItemEvents.description: Grants permission to view details about OpsItemEvents

ListOpsItemRelatedItems.description: Grants permission to view details about OpsItem RelatedItems

ListOpsMetadata.description: Grants permission to view a list of OpsMetadata objects

ListResourceComplianceSummaries.description: Grants permission to list resource-level summary count

ListResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to list information about resource data sync configurations in an account

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to view a list of resource tags for a specified resource

ModifyDocumentPermission.description: Grants permission to share a custom SSM document publicly or privately with specified AWS accounts

PutCalendar.description: Grants permission to create/edit a specific calendar

PutComplianceItems.description: Grants permission to register a compliance type and other compliance details on a specified resource

PutConfigurePackageResult.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to generate a report of the results of specific agent requests (internal Systems Manager call)

PutInventory.description: Grants permission to add or update inventory items on multiple specified managed instances

PutParameter.description: Grants permission to create an SSM parameter

RegisterDefaultPatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for an operating system type

RegisterManagedInstance.description: Grants permission to register a Systems Manager Agent

RegisterPatchBaselineForPatchGroup.description: Grants permission to specify the default patch baseline for a specified patch group

RegisterTargetWithMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to register a target with a specified maintenance window

RegisterTaskWithMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to register a task with a specified maintenance window

RemoveTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove a specified tag key from a specified resource

ResetServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to reset the service setting for an AWS account to the default value

ResumeSession.description: Grants permission to reconnect a Session Manager session to a managed instance

SendAutomationSignal.description: Grants permission to send a signal to change the current behavior or status of a specified Automation execution

SendCommand.description: Grants permission to run commands on one or more specified managed instances

StartAssociationsOnce.description: Grants permission to run a specified association manually

StartAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of an Automation document

StartChangeRequestExecution.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of an Automation Change Template document

StartSession.description: Grants permission to initiate a connection to a specified target for a Session Manager session

StopAutomationExecution.description: Grants permission to stop a specified Automation execution that is already in progress

TerminateSession.description: Grants permission to permanently end a Session Manager connection to an instance

UnlabelParameterVersion.description: Grants permission to remove an identifying label from a specified version of a parameter

UpdateAssociation.description: Grants permission to update an association and immediately run the association on the specified targets

UpdateAssociationStatus.description: Grants permission to update the status of the SSM document associated with a specified instance

UpdateDocument.description: Grants permission to update one or more values for an SSM document

UpdateDocumentDefaultVersion.description: Grants permission to change the default version of an SSM document

UpdateDocumentMetadata.description: Grants permission to update the metadata of an SSM document

UpdateInstanceAssociationStatus.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to update the status of the association that it is currently running (internal Systems Manager call)

UpdateInstanceInformation.description: Grants permission to SSM Agent to send a heartbeat signal to the Systems Manager service in the cloud

UpdateMaintenanceWindow.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window

UpdateMaintenanceWindowTarget.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window target

UpdateMaintenanceWindowTask.description: Grants permission to update a specified maintenance window task

UpdateManagedInstanceRole.description: Grants permission to assign or change the IAM role assigned to a specified managed instance

UpdateOpsItem.description: Grants permission to edit or change an OpsItem

UpdateOpsMetadata.description: Grants permission to update an OpsMetadata object

UpdatePatchBaseline.description: Grants permission to update a specified patch baseline

UpdateResourceDataSync.description: Grants permission to update a resource data sync

UpdateServiceSetting.description: Grants permission to update the service setting for an AWS account

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by 'Create' requests based on the allowed set of values for a specified tags

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by based on a tag key-value pair assigned to the AWS resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by 'Create' requests based on whether mandatory tags are included in the request

ssm:AutoApprove.description: Filters access by verifying that a user has permission to start Change Manager workflows without a review step (with the exception of change freeze events)

ssm:DocumentCategories.description: Filters access by verifying that a user has permission to access a document belonging to a specific category enum

ssm:Overwrite.description: Filters access by allowing Systems Manager parameters to be overwritten

ssm:Recursive.description: Filters access by allowing traversing hierarchical structure of the Systems Manager parameters

ssm:SessionDocumentAccessCheck.description: Filters access by verifying that a user has permission to access either the default Session Manager configuration document or the custom configuration document specified in a request

ssm:SourceInstanceARN.description: Filters access by verifying the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Systems Manager's managed instance from which the request is made. This key is not present when the request comes from the managed instance authenticated with an IAM role associated with EC2 instance profile

ssm:SyncType.description: Filters access by verifying that a user also has access to the ResourceDataSync SyncType specified in the request

ssm:resourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by allowing access based on a tag key-value pair assigned to the Systems Manager resource

ssm:resourceTag/tag-key.description: Filters access by allowing access based on a tag key-value pair assigned to the Systems Manager resource
